item.title: Ekta add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Ekta add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Ekta add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The difference between genius and stupidity is; genius has its limits." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Ekta add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "I am free of all prejudice. I hate everyone equally. " -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Creativity is knowing how to hide your sources" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't know the question, but sex is definitely the answer." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Ekta add a quote by George Burns
item.description: "Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city." -- George Burns

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I think God, in creating man, somewhat overestimated his ability." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "I love you like a fat kid loves cake!" -- Scott Adams

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "I don't do drugs. I am drugs." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Salvador Dalí
item.description: "There are some days when I think I'm going to die from an overdose of satisfaction." -- Salvador Dalí

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "When I am with you, we stay up all night. When you're not here, I can't go to sleep. Praise God for those two insomnias! And the difference between them." -- Rumi

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "What you seek is seeking you." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "The wound is the place where the Light enters you." -- Rumi

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "silence is the language of god, all else is poor translation." -- Rumi

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "A mountain keeps an echo deep inside. That's how I hold your voice." -- Rumi

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Reason is powerless in the expression of Love." -- Rumi

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Ekta add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "My lips got lost on the way to the kiss - that's how drunk I was." -- Rumi
